data.name: Lambs on the road : The beginning
data.detailed_description:
Lambs on the Road


From the creators of Eternum EX, in collaboration with Gone Mad studio.

Lambs on the road is a survival horror story of a father looking for her daughter.

Help John to find her daughter, Mary, throught different dangers, lost in a post-apocalyptic world where the chaos reigns.
Try to escape from the starving and desperate people, hide, run, fight and overall, never look back.

Features:
- A short heartbreaking story that will hold your heart in a fist
- A personal journey of learning how to survive
- A tale filled with horror and desperation
- Colorful art to accompany your journey
- A nice combination between platformer and adventure game
data.about_the_game:
Lambs on the Road


From the creators of Eternum EX, in collaboration with Gone Mad studio.

Lambs on the road is a survival horror story of a father looking for her daughter.

Help John to find her daughter, Mary, throught different dangers, lost in a post-apocalyptic world where the chaos reigns.
Try to escape from the starving and desperate people, hide, run, fight and overall, never look back.

Features:
- A short heartbreaking story that will hold your heart in a fist
- A personal journey of learning how to survive
- A tale filled with horror and desperation
- Colorful art to accompany your journey
- A nice combination between platformer and adventure game
data.short_description: Inspired on the bestseller ”The Road” by Cormac McCarthy. Lambs on the road is a adventure platformer game with small puzzles. Help John to find her daughter in a post-apocalyptic world plenty of dangers.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 8, 10
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Core2Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 470 de 1 GB/AMD HD 7870 de 2 GB
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 780 de 3 GB/AMD R9 290 de 4 GB
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.11+
  • Processor: 2 GHz dual core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.11+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 780 de 3 GB/AMD R9 290 de 4 GB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or SteamOS
  • Processor: 2 GHz dual core
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel Core i3
